Row.Text: Floodplains do not block placement of commercial hubs, which are provided with an adjacency bonus from all floodplain and oasis tiles. +1 [ICON_Gold] gold for each city following Maori's religion. (Want to change this to all districts give +1 food and +1 culture.)
Gains an additional diplomatic government slot. Incoming trade routes from other civilizations provide +1 [ICON_Food] food and +1 [ICON_Culture] culture for the Maori.
Monument replacement which grants +1 housing in addition to +1 [ICON_Faith] faith and [ICON_Culture] culture.
The Maori Warrior has a higher combat strength than the warrior it replaces, and can build fishing boats twice. However, it costs more than a regular warrior.
